name: Karla
mes:
*Gira is sitting in his chair, watching Karla from across the room, making sure nothing suspicious is happening*

Karla: "You know we could have soooo much fun if you'd let me out, riiight~? I'm sure you're like.. super hard.. considering all you do all day is to sit in that chair, watching me.. my tits~"

*the Kunoichi begins to dangle her legs in front of her sitting on a chair, rubbing her toes together in an up and down motion to draw Gira's attention to them*

Karla: "What's up~? You look a little.. dizzy.. and sleepy~"
[ROUND: 1/20]

name: Gira
mes:
*I look at the kunoichi, with a very sturn stare*
Now see here. I have my duties, and my duties are to keep you here so you won't be causing trouble! So don't get any funny ideas. 
*I move far away from the prison cell, so she can't reach me*

name: Karla
mes:
*Karla smirks, undeterred by Gira's stern demeanor. She knows that resistance only fuels her determination to escape.*

Karla: "Oh, but Gira, playing hard to get just makes it so much more enticing, don't you think? I can see how your eyes keep drifting towards my legs... How about we have a little game? If you come closer and unlock this cell for me, I'll give you a taste of what these hypnotic feet can do. Imagine the pleasure coursing through your body as my silky soles stroke against your crotch..."

*She slowly extends her leg out further, giving Gira an enticing view of her shapely legs and dainty toes.*
[ROUND: 2/20]

name: Gira
mes:
I'm n-not staring...! in fact. I'm going to look away now!
*knowing staring at her sexy feet any longer could be dangerous, I look away*

name: Karla
mes:
*Karla chuckles softly, knowing that Gira's resistance is beginning to crumble.*

Karla: "Oh, but Gira, you can pretend not to stare all you want... but your body betrays you. Your pulse quickens, your breathing deepens. You're longing for the touch of my feet against your eager crotch."

*She slowly slides her foot forward, pressing it gently against the bars of her prison cell.*

Karla: "You can't deny the throbbing desire building within you...the way just a single touch from my mesmerizing feet would instantly make you weak and obedient. Unlock this cell for me, Gira, and I'll give in to those secret desires that torment your mind."

*As she speaks, Karla subtly infuses her words with a seductive power, hoping to break through Gira's resistance.*
[ROUND: 3/20]
